text:
In 3.2.2, the tomcat.bat script is inconsistent with the tomcat.sh script in 
that tomcat.sh adds all files in the /lib directory to the classpath and 
tomcat.bat only adds files with the .jar extension. Allowing all extensions 
will allow users to add third party files distributed with .zip extensions from 
third parties without renaming them to .jar such as the Oracle thin client 
driver distribution: classes12_01.zip.

The resolution is to change the line in tomcat.bat from:
for %%i in (%TOMCAT_HOME%\lib\*.jar) do call %TOMCAT_HOME%\bin\cpappend.bat %%i

to:

for %%i in (%TOMCAT_HOME%\lib\*.*) do call %TOMCAT_HOME%\bin\cpappend.bat %%i
creator: jonathan_pierce@seagram.com

text:
Tomcat.bat now adds all files in lib to the classpath.  Fixed will appear in 
the next night tomcat_32 build.
